properties.name: citrus.simulator.endpoint.enabled
properties.description: En/Disables generic Citrus endpoint support on simulator. When enabled you can add any Citrus endpoint as inbound request source.

properties.name: citrus.simulator.configuration.class
properties.description: Full qualified class name of additional Spring Java configuration to automatically load beans from.

properties.name: citrus.simulator.rest.swagger.enabled
properties.description: En/Disables auto generated scenarios from Swagger Open API specification.

properties.name: citrus.simulator.rest.swagger.api
properties.description: Swagger Open API specification file to auto generate scenarios from.

properties.name: citrus.simulator.rest.swagger.contextPath
properties.description: Context path automatically added to request path mappings when using auto generate scenarios from Swagger Open API specification.

properties.name: citrus.simulator.ws.wsdl.enabled
properties.description: En/Disables auto generated scenarios from WSDL specification.

properties.name: citrus.simulator.ws.wsdl.location
properties.description: WSDL file to auto generate scenarios from.

properties.name: citrus.simulator.inbound.xml.dictionary.enabled
properties.description: En/Disables default inbound XML data dictionaries.

properties.name: citrus.simulator.outbound.xml.dictionary.enabled
properties.description: En/Disables default outbound XML data dictionaries.

properties.name: citrus.simulator.inbound.json.dictionary.enabled
properties.description: En/Disables default inbound JSON data dictionaries.

properties.name: citrus.simulator.outbound.json.dictionary.enabled
properties.description: En/Disables default outbound JSON data dictionaries.
